author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
This has been happening somewhat "consistently" where one day we'll have coverage reported for SMA and on another day it's completely missing.  With SMA being the biggest part of PowerShell, this makes it hard to know what the real CC data is.

Recent commit missing SMA: https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/03e3257b0a91af29f597e823d9f22b84c147930f/src

Prior commit including SMA:
https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/1e4cbe15ff5a64476ab24708933538664b566df7/src
title: SMA files are inconsistently uploaded to codecov.io
